values:
Hey.Beena while since i last updated due to my comp fuckin up on a regular basis!Anyways last friday was at a party which turned out to be pretty good.Got absolutely rattled(had bottle of hoegaarden and two bottles of leffe:S,bought them cus the bottles looked kool lol).A bunch of ned scum approached and the party got a bit chaotic until dell told them to piss off(cheers dell!:D)Went back to Dave's along with Pols,Alan,Bell,Simba,Sarah and Carr.Sat about and jus bantered 'til a few mins later i ran out the door and puked ma guts up all over the pavement.Carr was with me at the time and helped me into my taxi and stayed with me the whole time i was out there.(thanks a lot man,what a guy)Got home and went straight to sleep.Woke up the next morning feelin all shaky and shit but after a while i felt ok.Played bass for a long time then went to the garage.Bought booze for everyone and we wer all rattled especially Nells(lmao what a funny motherfucker:D)who was dancin to the smiths and doing a rather great impersenation of Morrisey!Wasnt feelin the drink kick in unfortunately until quite later on.C-Unit,Tom and Carly were over too.Ended up KO'ing around 12 lol and waking up at 3 to find that it was only me nells,c-unit and tom in the garage!Where'd everyone go!?Nells told me they ahd gone to a party so i followed...We got there and it was shite(some ugly bitch said to dave that she wanted to rub her flange in his face!)<--some gross shit right there i tell ya!Went into the  kitchen and collectively we began to stole as much booze as we cud carry.Overall we managed to nab several beers,bottle of vodka,bottle of tia maria and two bottles of wine lol!On the way back we saw red lights on some thing and Pols thought theyre were snipers about lmao!was crazzzy!Returned to garage and we all moved into Dave's front room where we went to sleep.I slept on the floor with one pillow.I did not have a good sleep.Left fairly early the next morning with Clarkey and just played bass and arsed around the whole day.Lookin forward to the sept weekend - shall be a weekend to remember!:D

Catch ya later
                         Stu XxX

Hey hey.after one hell of a long absence i have come back to post(yup my shitey computer is workin again!:D)Ive just  been at the garage doin the usual toke,toke thing the whole time and been at skool which isnt too bad.Saw baseketball and Battle Royale 2(tis good but cant beat the first)Lotsa ppl at the garage last friday (mavis and clarkey to name a few...)and we tagged are logos on the garage:D.Durin the past 2 weeks i can honestly say i havent been so fucked in ma life(esp. both friday nights)Classic.Had band practice last sunday which was good,came up with a new song called Eskimo(Primus-esque lyrics and funky bass lines).Unfortunately after skool(durin weekdays)is so fuckin borin!All i can do is play bass,play PS2,watch Primus DVD and munch...gets rather tedious after repeating this week in,week out(ya know).Top bands at the mo are X Japan and Primus.Tomoro shud be pretty kool,goin to Glagow Uni open day(good excuse to get pissed and skive:D)Catch ya later.

    Stu xxx

Orite.Tuesday was the day of the exam results.Got woken up at haf 9 and read ma results: C-Phys C-Eng C-Bio D-Geo.How the fuck can ya fail geo?i mean seriously:S.Anyhoo tuesday night was the best.Mclenny hosted one hell of a party.Went in for Andy Carr then headed up to Dave's (Gold ring and a bottle of absinthe).Nells,Tom ,Bell and Ross were there so we began the long road to muirend.Me n Nells stopped off at sainsburys to get Bell,Tom and my carry outs.We then met Butch and Carr n Ross went in for Lauren.We walkedfurther and then Butch asked em to get him a carry out and Nells needed his Southern Comfort.We collected it tehn went to the party.Gotta admit,id never expected the party to be as good as it was.Everyone was there- old friends from Netherlee days lol eg.Fiona,Nicola,Elliot and so on.Got pretty pissed round 11pm (some fuckin neds came in) fuckin scum taht they are left so twas all good.Everyone was chanting songs n shit and hangin out in the back alleys lol ,was awesome.neighbours werent too chuffed (so fuck 'em! heh!)Butch started makin sum bacon lol and the he made a pizza!Butchie Oliver!Gav Bell came over (class guy).We (Nells,C-Unit,Stu,Warets,Gav) stumbled back home.Nells and C-Unit taxied it back up the road (well done to C-unit gettin into Uni! woo!)Eventually we went aour seperate ways so me n Warets jis walked back home.Til later


          Stu xx

Hey there.Sat night was the fuckin bomb!At the beginning me n Bell marched to Sainsbury's to pick up the booze and the fags that were requested then we went to the garage.Dave,Nells,Ross,Alz and Carr were all there.We got a half ounce which we finished in bout 2 hours.Jill came down too.Was kool.Mike and his crew came up and the party started heehee,they brought us a quarter which was dusted off in bout jis under an hour lol.Heavily stoned we were.Mike and his crew left to rob the Esso garage.We watched Starsky and Hutch which was fuckin hilarious.When everyone left,it was jis me,Dave,Nells n Ross.Me n Nells flew down the road at 5 eager to get our hands on some munchies.Despite the fact it was 5 we saw a few ppl about (oddness)Maybe they was stoned too,Who knows!!!We returned to the garage to watch Starship Troopers-a class movie!Dave KO'd (man he was fuckin wasted!)and then so did the rest of us.Today i returned home and i havent been so bored/warm in ma life!

   Later
                     Stu xx

   Later
                     Stu xx

Current Mood:slightly bored
Current Music:Dream Theater - Metropolis

Heyy.Yday was fuckin amazin!Everyone was back together and we got an ounce which we dusted off in bout4 hours lol!Ah well.Stu bell KO'd round 11-12 lmao!He gave funny banter as always:D.Him n Nells lmao!Anyways im off to get ready.

Later
                   Stu x

Heyhey.Yesterday kicked some ass!Me,Dave,Ross,Carr and Bell all up at The Garage ended up gettin a quarter along with a hefty ounce:D:Dheehee.We watched 3 Amigos again lol!:D:D:D.Unfortunately the quarter lasted just over an hour but tonite is the nite.Everyone will be there who wasnt yday:Alz,Nells and Stu Bell:D!Its gonna be one hell of a nite!

Later

            Stu xxx

Hey hey!jis bak from Portugal on the 22nd.Was shite till i met Pollock and Bell- we cruised the nightclubs searching for cheap booze prices,weed and some pretty chikies.Twas great!When i got bak Dave had jis got bak so the garage was up and runnin once again.Hefty tokin was the way it went.Jis me,Dave,Nells n Carr.Ive been fucked for 3 weeks straight now hehe and it feels great indeed!Apart from that ma band has changed its name from Ripchord to S.T.D.(Spilt The Difference):P.Got a gig comin up at the end of August.

Later

Stu xx

Hehe..man that really was Partocalypse!:D Stu Clark here - jesus christ i was stoned that night then again had lotsa to drink aswell.twas a great party however, sum fat bastard called Hissy came:@and i got a bomber in ma dad's shirt lol.fuck twas crazy.knew a few ppl there cus i jis moved to williamwood but its great nonetheless.anyways im off to the pub.Later xxx
